summary: This is an email forwarding a news article from The Daily Beast about federal investigators questioning Jeffrey Epstein's victims regarding sex-trafficking crimes. The email notes there is no mention of the sender's office in the article.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the news article being forwarded; federal investigators are asking his victims about sex-trafficking crimes.

events.title: News Article on Federal Investigation
events.description: The Daily Beast publishes an article reporting that federal investigators are questioning Jeffrey Epstein's victims about sex-trafficking crimes.

keyFacts: A news article from The Daily Beast on June 3, 2019, reports federal investigators are questioning Jeffrey Epstein's victims about sex-trafficking crimes.
The email forwarding the article notes there is no mention of the sender's office in the report.
The document is an internal email forwarding media coverage of the ongoing Epstein investigation.
